canGroupAccessMineLocation() - Method in class com.example.mapnector.FirebaseCommunication.FirebaseLocationSystem
true if current group(ADmanager.lastSelectedGroup) can access my location, false otherwise
canJoinLeaveGroup - Static variable in class com.example.mapnector.FirebaseCommunication.FirebaseGroupSystem
indicates if we can join or leave or do some action to an group; suppose we asked to join group and then internet goes - we don'w want to request to leave/join another group until we get response from firebase and then we open this opportunity; true means can join/leave otherwise false

color - Variable in class com.example.mapnector.FirebaseCommunication.FirebaseLocationSystem.DoubleDoubleName
there is a certain number of marker colors google map provides as; we access them via BitmapDescriptorFactory.HUE_BLUE, BitmapDescriptorFactory.HUE_RED and so on; in their core those values are floats, so to save that data i made color float

current - Static variable in class com.example.mapnector.FirebaseCommunication.FirebaseHelper
User.class object that represents the current user(me, the guy who just logged in); the value of this object is set in fgs.DB_InitCurrentUser and its one of the most important variables of the app, so until we retrieve it we show dialog that not allows the user to do stuff in the app
